story_17_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: This is it—the real thing. Are you girls ready?
story_17_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
That’s what I like to hear.
[Name:PlayerNickname ], was it?
story_17_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
As you can see, we are a team of
Ghost-type Pokémon Trainers.
story_17_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
We’ll show you just how strong a team full
of ghosts can be—and win while we’re at it!
story_17_02000/2401_0402_1000_10:
Ahahaha, perhaps this will be over
before the battle begins?
story_17_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Enough with the formalities! Let’s get started.
After all, Pokémon are—
